name: 阿德里亚娜·拉布雷斯
name_full: 阿德里亚娜·拉布雷斯 Adriana Llabrés
introduction: Adriana studied acting at the East 15 Conservatory in London. She continued her studies at The American Academy of Dramatic Arts in New York. She performed in theater plays such as Magdalena's Crossing at the Midtown Intl. Festival, A Creed for Those Who Have Suffered at the Summer NY Festival and was invited to join the British company Mind The Gap, supported by Judi Dench and Helen Mirren. In Mexico, she has worked in "Tales of Mexico", "Que pena tu vida", and has starred in plays such as "The Cherry Orchard", "Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?" "La Ultima Palabra" directed by Angelica Aragon. An actress with great handling of humor and drama, 100% bilingual.
